```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(htmltools)
setwd("/Users/Jinyan/Data Science/Data Science Courses/09_DevelopingDataProducts//coursera_datascience_ddp/")
data <- read.table("assignment1-data", sep = ",")
names(data) <- c("place", "lat", "lng", "url")

attractSites <- paste("<a href = '", data$url, "'>", data$place, "</a>", sep = "")

data %>%
      leaflet() %>%
      addTiles() %>%
      addMarkers(popup = attractSites)
```
